Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Northeastern in 1983...
Injured on 5/23/1984 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/10/1985 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 7/25/1986 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1987...
Injured on 8/11/1987 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Northeastern on 2/3/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $2,650,000 per year...
